author: Simon Difford
description: This Negroni has a beautiful red hue and is more bittersweet than it is fruity (as you'd expect of a Negroni).
name: Pomegranate Negroni
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
